name: Sofiya Style
format:
<script type="text/javascript" class="init">
  // list of id nodes 
  var node = [
      'f0f55902.ebf28',
      '292f3a2e.b38eee',
      '1bd612be.094b3d',
    ];

  function Sofiya() {
    $('md-card').each(function() {
      var card = $(this);
      if ($.inArray(card.attr('node-id'), node) >= 0) {
        card.addClass('sofiya');
        console.log('Sofiya node-id: ' + card.attr('node-id'));
      }
    });
  }
  $(document).ready(function() {
    setTimeout(function() {
      console.log('Sofiya init');
      Sofiya();
    }, 150);
    setTimeout(function() {
      $("md-sidenav").click(function() {
        console.log('Sofiya click');
        Sofiya();
      });
    }, 250);
  });
  $(document).on('touchmove', function(e) {
    e.preventDefault();
  });
</script>
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Exo+2:400,700" rel="stylesheet">
<style>
  #Sofiya_Sofiya {
    background-color: #FAFAFA;
    font-family: 'Exo 2', sans-serif;
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    border: none;
  }
  
  #Sofiya_Sofiya .nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
    margin: 0;
    color: #000000;
  }
  /* switch */
  /* none */
  
  .nr-dashboard-switch.sofiya {
    background-color: #F4F4F4 !important;
    border-radius: 8px;
    padding: 8px;
    font-family: 'Exo 2', sans-serif;
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  }
  
  .nr-dashboard-switch.sofiya p {
    padding: 8px;
    margin: 8px;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    color: #9F9F9F;
  }
  
  .nr-dashboard-switch.sofiya md-switch {
    padding: 8px;
    margin: 8px !important;
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    top: 0;
  }
  
  .nr-dashboard-switch.sofiya md-switch .md-container {
    margin-right: 0;
  }
  /* icon */
  
  .nr-dashboard-switch.sofiya ui-icon {
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
  }
  
  .nr-dashboard-switch.sofiya ui-icon .fa-fw {
    padding: 8px;
    margin: 8px;
    width: auto;
    min-width: 0;
  }
  
  .nr-dashboard-switch.sofiya ui-icon .fa-fw.fa-4x {
    padding: 4px 8px;
    margin: 8px;
    width: auto;
    min-width: 0;
  }
  /* switch */
  
  .nr-dashboard-text.sofiya {
    background-color: #F4F4F4 !important;
    border-radius: 8px;
    padding: 8px;
    font-family: 'Exo 2', sans-serif;
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  }
  
  .nr-dashboard-text.sofiya .label {
    padding: 8px;
    margin: 8px;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    color: #9F9F9F;
  }
  /* left */
  
  .nr-dashboard-text.layout-align-start-center.sofiya .value {
    padding: 8px;
    margin: 8px;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 0;
  }
  /* center */
  
  .nr-dashboard-text.layout-align-center-center.sofiya .value {
    padding: 8px;
    margin: 8px;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
  }
  /* right */
  
  .nr-dashboard-text.layout-align-end-center.sofiya .value {
    padding: 8px;
    margin: 8px;
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    top: 0;
  }
  /* text */
</style>
